recipe.title: Skull Candy Apple Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Insert a cake pop stick through the top of an apple.
Create a melting face by using melted white chocolate. Outline three circles on the side of your apple. Leave these circles unfilled.
Create a dripping design around the apple by coating the apple with melted white chocolate.
Use red gel frosting to garnish your apple and to create an oozing blood design.
